data.system_settings: iPhone 7 Plus, iOS 11.3 Public Beta (Should also happen with iOS 11.2.5)
data.actual_result: The chat will be like "half slided" to the left again.
data.expected_result: The chat should be still slided to the right
data.short_description: Apple Maps changes the chat's position
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Apple Maps - Start a new route  - Go to your home screen - Open Discord  - Slide your chat to the right - Go to your home screen again (without closing Discord) - Go back to Discord
